CHAT.comment: INYO COUNTY, CALIFORNIA, ET AL., Petitioners v. PAIUTE-SHOSHONE INDIANS OF THE BISHOP COMMUNITY OF THE BISHOP COLONY, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:16 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN D. KIRBY ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA B. McDOWELL ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES AS AMICUS CURIAE SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS IN PART AND THE RESPONDENTS IN PART
ORAL ARGUMENT OF REID PEYTON CHAMBERS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN D. KIRBY ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:15 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted. [*54] )
